publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6902 Linda Fabiani: Robert Wiseman Dairies’ Sharesave Scheme—That the Parliament congratulates the employees of East Kilbride-based Robert Wiseman Dairies who took part in the company’s sharesave scheme, which has now matured after five years; notes that participants in the scheme have received average returns of £7,000;applaudsRobert Wiseman Dairies for sharingthe fruits of the company’s growth and success with thestaff whose workhelped tosecure it, and commends sharesave schemes as a meansfor companies to not only help their staff save money, but also to acknowledge and reward the commitment and loyalty of employees whocontribute tobusiness success.
